NewsItem.HEADLINE: Cellular IoT Devices 2018
NewsItem.SUMMARY: Clear insight into the technical and business model evolution between GPRS, 3G, LTE, NB-IoT, and 5G NR IoT.
NewsItem.NEWSLINETEXT: This 5-year forecast (2018-2023) provides guidance on the growth of LTE-M and NB-IoT as well as the early adoption of 5G IoT devices. Revenue and shipment forecasts cover the service level, device level, module level, and the semiconductor level of the market. Market share estimates are provided for module and chip vendors.
NewsItem.KEYWORDS: Cellular IoT Internet of Things GSM GPRS EDGE EC-GSM UMTS WCDMA 3G 2G LTE 4G Cat-4 Cat-13 Cat-1 Cat-0 Cat-M Cat-NB Cat-NB1 NB-IoT LTE-M module device forecast
NewsItem.ATTACHMENT: mexp-c-iot-18 rev0 ericsson.pdf, mexp-c-iot-18 rev0 ericsson.xlsx
